name: HowToGiveYourBossTheFingerPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: I have met countless people who either hate their job or the people that they work with. They all talk of leaving one day and starting their own business. Most talk a good game and some will actually make it happen. Here we will talk about how to actually make your dream come true. Most businesses fail from lack of knowledge, not having someone to cheer you on. We are here to be your cheerleader. Help is here for you as we get expert advice from our guest who has made the leap into financial freedom.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
